mapper.insert: insert into PROMISES_AND_PLACES (GROUP_ID, PROMISE_ID, USER_ID, PLACE_ID) values (#{groupId}, #{promiseId}, #{userId}, #{placeId})
mapper.select: select P.PLACE_ID, P.NAME, ADDRESS, LNG, LAT, URL, U.NAME pickedUserName, (select count(*) from VOTES where GROUP_ID = #{groupId} and PROMISE_ID = #{promiseId} and PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID) voteNum, (select count(*) = 1 from VOTES where GROUP_ID = #{groupId} and PROMISE_ID = #{promiseId} and PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID and USER_ID = #{userId}) isVoted from PROMISES_AND_PLACES inner join PLACES P on P.PLACE_ID = PROMISES_AND_PLACES.PLACE_ID inner join USERS U on PROMISES_AND_PLACES.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where GROUP_ID = #{groupId} and PROMISE_ID = #{promiseId}
